text: <@U1RLZ5729> : I guess test_vp0 is used to run "peer" itself to identify as client to membersrvc, so you can not use it. And as for second error, rest api does not support to entitle users. This feature is avaialble in Node SDK. There are some doc. around SDK here.
I got it. You are correct. Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
